titles.title: A bill to amend title 36, United States Code, to grant a Federal charter to the Military Officers Association of America, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 7/14/2009--Introduced. Grants a federal charter to the Military Officers Association of America (a nonprofit corporation and incorporated under the laws of the Commonwealth of Virginia).
